Motion Detection 2.0.Human/Vehicle Analysis: Deep learning-based motion detection 2.0 is enabled by default for all analog channels, it can classify human and vehicle, and extremely reduce false alarms caused by objects like leaves and lights; Quick search by object or event type is supported;

Facial Detection.Facial Detection and Capture: Face picture detection, face picture search

Video and Audio.IP Video Input: 4-ch (up to 12-ch) Up to 8 MP resolution Enhanced IP mode on: 8-ch (up to 16-ch), each up to 4 Mbps ;Support H.265+/H.265/H.264+/H.264 IP cameras
Video and Audio.Analog Video Input: 8-ch;BNC interface (1.0 Vp-p, 75 Ω), supporting coaxitron connection
Video and Audio.CVBS Output: 1-ch, BNC (1.0 Vp-p, 75 Ω), resolution: PAL: 704 × 576, NTSC: 704 × 480
Video and Audio.Two-Way Audio: 1-ch, RCA (2.0 Vp-p, 1 KΩ) (using the first audio input)

Recording.Frame Rate: Main stream: 8 MP@8 fps/3K@12 fps/5 MP@12 fps/4 MP@15 fps/8 MP Lite@15 fps/3 MP@18 fps 1080p/720p/WD1/4CIF/VGA/CIF@25 fps (P)/30 fps (N) Sub-stream: WD1/4CIF/CIF@25 fps (P)/30 fps (N)

Network.Network Protocol: TCP/IP, PPPoE, DHCP, Hik-Connect, DNS, DDNS, NTP, SADP, NFS, iSCSI, UPnP™, HTTPS, ONVIF

Auxiliary Interface.Capacity: Up to 10 TB capacity for each disk
